tasks.label: Run app
tasks.command: cd ${workspaceFolder} && docker build -t cas-interface . && docker run -t -p 10000:10000 cas-interface

tasks.label: Open Shell in App Stage
tasks.command: cd ${workspaceFolder} && docker build -t cas-interface . && docker run -it --rm -p 10000:10000 cas-interface /bin/ash

tasks.label: Open Shell in Builder Stage
tasks.command: cd ${workspaceFolder} && docker build --target builder -t cas-interface-builder . && docker run -it --rm cas-interface-builder /bin/bash
